text: The Hot R&B;/Hip-Hop Songs is a Billboard chart that ranks the top 50 most popular R&B; and Hip hop songs in the United States. The chart is ranked by Billboard. Since it has started, the chart has been renamed many times to accurately reflect the music industry at that time. There is also a chart called the Bubbling Under R&B;/Hip-Hop Singles which ranks the top 25 songs that are making progress onto the main R&B;/hip-hop chart. ==References== == Other websites == *Billboard Hot R&B;/Hip-Hop Songs chart *Bubbling Under R&B;/Hip-Hop Songs chart Category:Billboard charts
title: Hot R&B/Hip-Hop Songs
